title: Analysis of f from graph of its derivative part - a

content.description: The figure above shows the graph of f ', the derivative of the function f , on the closed interval <math> <mrow> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 1 </mn> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mi> x </mi> <mo> ≤ </mo> <mn> 5 </mn> </mrow> </math> . The graph of f ' has horizontal tangent lines at x =1 and x =3. The function f is twice differentiable with f (2)=6.
content.question: Find the x-coordinate of each of the points of inflection of the graph of f. Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of each of the points of inflection of the graph of f. Give a reason for your answer.
